DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , retrospective , observational study evaluate therapeutic effectiveness strategy induction Fuzeon ( enfuvirtide ) within optimize regimen antiretroviral drug patient HIV-1 infection routine clinical practice .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Induction Therapy With Fuzeon ( Enfuvirtide ) Combination With Antiretroviral Drugs Patients With HIV-1 Infection
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /= 18 year age HIV1+ infection Patients viral load > 50 copies/ml receive induction treatment Fuzeon combination antiretroviral treatment Na√Øve Fuzeon initiation induction treatment Antiretroviral treatment least 12 month duration Patients receive Fuzeon treatment
